text: Khawsa, United States National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency is a town in Ye Township in Mawlamyine District in the Mon State of southern Myanmar. Khawsa lies on the Khawsa Chaung about from the coast of the Andaman Sea.Burma 1:250,000 topographic map, Series U542, ND 47-02 Ye U.S. Army Map Service, December 1959 It is protected from the sea by a hill and the Mount Pawdaing rises to the east. ==Notes== ==External links== * "Khawsa Map — Satellite Images of Khawsa" Maplandia World Gazetteer Category:Populated places in Mon State
title: Khawsa
